title: Unknown type name ‘clockid_t’ error when building only Null platform

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Bug reports and bugfix pull requests

labels.name: build
labels.description: Build file bugs and PRs (not compilation errors)

body:
I've encountered a compilation issue when trying to build GLFW from source on Linux platforms (as part of a simple project that uses [dawn](https://dawn.googlesource.com/dawn)). The build instructions I have used are below. 
I've tested this on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS with GCC 11.4.0. 

```
git clone https://github.com/glfw/glfw
cd glfw
cmake -B build -G Ninja -DGLFW_USE_X11=OFF
cmake --build build
```
The project successfully configures, but there is a compilation error during the build stage. Someone on the dawn matrix channel pointed out that the following issue may be relevant https://github.com/floooh/sokol/issues/852.
